segments.text: Do Mona and Jim need a new house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , they have a big new fancy house .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does Jim make a lot of money ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , he does . He is a science fiction writer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does Jim need to make more money ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Afraid so . The more the better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do they need all that money for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , they spend it pretty quick . New clothes , new computers and new cars every year . And they â€™ Ve got a cook and housekeeper.Mona used to be an actress , she likes to spend a lot of money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do they have any children ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . They want children but no luck yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What does Jim like to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Jim likes to travel around the world.That ' s expensive ! So he tries to make a lot of money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What does Mona like to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , she enjoys spending money on fancy parties.Mona loves to wear sexy dresses , and she has quite a bit of jewelry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ... She sounds like a high maintenance wife .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess so . She is also interested in politics . She knows everyone in city government .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Politics can be an expensive hobby .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She is pretty serious about it . Her uncle is a mayor . She wants to follow in his footsteps .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Politics is a hard game to play .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She might do well . Everyone seems to like her .
segments.speaker: S2
